answers.answer: see if this works- make a whole in the center of the gauze, put it through your thumb and hold it down with bandaids

question: I do not have diabetes, but I could not find any other forum here for wound care issues.    Does anyone know of bandaids that are customized to the shape of different parts of the hand?  I have a burn wound that goes around the base of my thumb.  It is a real hassle to have to dress it each day with gauze and then tape that down in various places.   I also end up with tape all over my hand which is not very comfortable.  I am imaging someone would make a large band aid that wraps around the base of the thumb?
title: Custom Shaped Bandaids?
